description:
This project module builds on the contents of MUA3188 Live Sound Reinforcement, allowing students to practice more independently in a professional environment. Students will be required to assemble a production team. In addition, they are required to plan and submit a project application to the project director. A final paper about the project they will be engaged in during the semester is also required. Students will need to finish the live sound projects for at least 2 classical music recitals and
2 pop concerts.
title: Live Sound Reinforcement Project
